snp2.5:1.2_0: ekaṁ samayaṁ bhagavā gayāyaṁ viharati ṭaṅkitamañce sūcilomassa yakkhassa bhavane.
snp2.5:1.3_0: Tena kho pana samayena kharo ca yakkho sūcilomo ca yakkho bhagavato avidūre atikkamanti.
snp2.5:1.4_0: Atha kho kharo yakkho sūcilomaṁ yakkhaṁ etadavoca:
snp2.5:1.7_0: Yāvāhaṁ jānāmi yadi vā so samaṇo, yadi vā so samaṇako”ti.
snp2.5:2.1_0: Atha kho sūcilomo yakkho yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkami; upasaṅkamitvā bhagavato kāyaṁ upanāmesi.
snp2.5:2.3_0: Atha kho sūcilomo yakkho bhagavantaṁ etadavoca:
snp2.5:4.1_1: passāmi sadevake loke samārake sabrahmake sassamaṇabrāhmaṇiyā pajāya sadevamanussāya yo me cittaṁ vā
snp2.5:4.1_2: khipeyya hadayaṁ vā phāleyya pādesu vā gahetvā pāragaṅgāya khipeyya.
snp2.5:4.2_0: Api ca tvaṁ, āvuso, puccha yadākaṅkhasī”ti.
snp2.5:4.3_0: Atha kho sūcilomo yakkho bhagavantaṁ gāthāya ajjhabhāsi:
